HUAWEI Reader en_GB
Help • What are redeem codes? Redeem codes are user reward prize packs offered by hwread.They may include books, VIPs, Read Coins, or vouchers. • How to win redeem codes? Copy complete 1.As book mall circle activity gifts. 2.As MicroBlog or WeChat interactive lucky draw gifts. 3.As offline card printing gifts. You can participate in various activities to win redeem codes. • How to use the redeem code? After getting a redeem code, enter it at “Me” - “Gifts” - “Redeem Gift card” to redeem. • Rules of Use 1.Redeem codes expire. Use them in a timely manner. 2.The same redeem code can only be used for the same account once. 3.Please enter the correct redeem code. The number of attempts is limited each day.
OK User status Valid until Automatic renewal fee Automatic renewal time
Should Comment Real name authentication required to post on national network Linked phone number required to post comment Management regulations Brief introduction of contents 简介 推荐 No comments Add Publisher Disclaimer My comments My ratings
Read-coins Vouchers
HUAWEI Reader is an app by Huawei Software Technologies Co., Ltd., providing such functions as downloading, reading and managing e-books. In order to realize these functions, the app requires networking and enabling mobile phone permissions and functions, including storage, phone, and collects and uses your information as below: Device information including identifier, screen size, operating system, model, country code, resolution, and system language； Network information including connection status, access mode and type, and IP address; Client information including version, download channel, and open/close times; App information including a list of downloaded e-book, e-book reading and search records, Huawei ID, paid purchase records, and display and click records of advertisement contents;Other relevant data you have submitted to us including problem logs, contact information, and country/region. This information will be transmitted through and saved to servers within the territory of the People\'s Republic of China. Message reception is still active in the background after connecting to the network when you exit the App.
If you do not agree to us collecting the above information, or to enabling the relevant mobile phone permissions, the app will not function properly. We will not be able to provide services for you. You can log out to terminate some data collection, or quit the app to terminate all functions or data collection and processing. By selecting “Agree”, you consent to the above contents and the HUAWEI Reader User Agreement, and Statement on HUAWEI Reader and Privacy.
Click \'Agree\' to show that you have agreed with the above terms and the HUAWEI Reader User Agreement. 1.Top up reading is limited to this book mall only。 2.Use non-SMS methods for top up. 1 yuan for 100 Read Coins。 3. Vouchers from recharge are valid for 7 days. Check the expiration date in My Account - Vouchers - Validity。 4. If the account balance remains unchanged for a time after top up, please record your username, #userId#, and call the customer service hotline at 400–118–0066。
H-coins
Both Read Coins and vouchers can be used to buy books. Read Coins remain permanently valid after top up, but the voucher expires. Expiry > Settings
